cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP data port to an out-of-range value 99999 will cause F1-D interface binding failures and prevent F1AP data message exchange with the DU.

du.explanation_en: Setting the CSI-RS enable flag to an invalid value of 99 will cause channel state information reference signal configuration errors and prevent proper CSI-RS transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將 CSI-RS 啟用旗標設定為無效值 99 會導致通道狀態資訊參考訊號配置錯誤，並阻止正確的 CSI-RS 傳輸。
